text:
Heading: Market Research Analysis: Fin Tech-Enabled D2C Farm Products in Tamil Nadu, India
Subheading: Consumer Analysis: Farmers & Urban Consumers
Farmers' Pain Points: Limited access to credit, price fluctuations, and inefficient supply chains. Urban Consumer Preferences: High demand for organic, pesticide-free, and farm-fresh produce. Digital Adoption: Increasing smartphone usage among farmers, enabling digital payments and e-commerce participation.
